Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 128th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2019...
Injured on 5/5/2019 with a Bruised Foot, out for 5 days...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 3/2/2020 (Going to CIN: RF Alonzo Alonso. Going to HOU: 3B Justin Tepper, CF Lawrence Sauter, P Ronald Diep, P Rueben Goodin)...
Injured on 4/19/2020 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/24/2020 with a Fractured Hip, out for 5 weeks...

Injured on 8/5/2021 with a Concussion, out for one week...

1/31/2027: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
